description: Event Collection Quality Filters - Controls what events get stored in database

impact_level_filters.comment: Only store events with this impact level or higher
impact_level_filters.reasoning: Focus on significant events that justify astrological analysis

category_filters.comment: Disabled categories will be filtered out unless impact_level is 'critical'

impact_metrics_thresholds.comment: Events must meet AT LEAST ONE of these thresholds to be stored

low_level.comment: Low impact events are generally filtered out

geographic_filters.comment: Events must be at least state-level unless critical impact. Options: 'local', 'state', 'national', 'international'

blacklist.comment: Events containing these keywords will be filtered out unless critical impact

required_for_low_impact.comment: Low-impact events must contain at least one of these keywords

source_credibility.comment: Events should have verifiable news sources

deduplication.comment: Prevent storing duplicate events. Checks title similarity and date proximity

astrological_relevance.comment: If false, events without astrological mapping will be filtered out

quality_scoring.comment: Events must score at least this value (0-100) to be stored. Lower = more lenient

special_rules.comment: These categories bypass most filters due to astrological significance

collection_limits.comment: If fewer than min_events found, system will log warning but not fail

time_window_filters.comment: Events older than this will be filtered out (prevents collecting old news as new)
